ygData.subject: Re: Anti-Camping ?
ygData.msgSnippet: I could be wrong, but I believe the journyman boots are a lore item and can t be purchased from anyone else. The only way to get them is to camp there.
ygData.messageBody:
I could be wrong, but I believe the journyman boots are a lore item and can't
be purchased from anyone else. The only way to get them is to camp there.

Ranoldar

In a message dated 8/11/99 7:43:31 AM US Mountain Standard Time,
that_transgirl@... writes:

> From: "That Transgirl" <that_transgirl@...>
>
> I often wonder if it isn't simply easier to hunt non-camped (or
> lesser-camped) spawns and earn enough coin to buy the goodie I want from a
> player that has one for sale...
>
> Not only that, but I get to earn a lot of experience as I hunt another
> critter while waiting for one to respawn.
>
> Just a thought...
>
